original_text: That thy trust may be in the Lord, I have made known to thee this day, even to thee.
korean_text: 내가 네게 여호와를 의뢰하게 하려 하여 이것을 오늘 특별히 네게 알게 하였노니

sentences.original_text: That thy trust may be in the Lord,
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 주 안에 신뢰를 두게 하려고

sentences.original_text: I have made known to thee this day,
